missions.description: You need to get a selphie with your target player.
You need to get a hug from your target player.
You need to get your target player to sing a song.
You need to get your target player to dance.
You need to get a high-five from your target player.
You need to get your target player to tell a joke.
You need to get your target player to share a secret.
You need to get your target player to do a funny face.
You need to get your target player to do 10 jumping jacks.
